titles.title: Thou Art Lord Control Our Will (a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou art our Lord Control our will And keep each fleshly movement still What safety in Thy rule is known What sure salvation As we own Thyself as Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou art our Priest Thou dost sustain Our hearts in either Joy or pain The holiest Is now our place Our hearts are drawn There by Thy grace For Thou art Priest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Thou art Head In Thee the mind May wisdom and Direction find Love's own direction For the heart Now learns with Thee Its heavenly part With Thee the Head{/lang-eng}
